overview: Vince Vouyer plays a rock-n-roll star who finds himself the victim of a small town speed trap. He soon ends up spending time at the local gray-bar hotel while the sexiest women in town are doing everything in their power to get arrested just to be near him. His manager played by the forever lustful Kaitlyn Ashley does her best to get him freed by bestowing sexual favors on the courthouse crew. Fun and fornication for all in this behind-the-bars sex-feast.
title: Bad Girls 3: Cellblock 69
